sentences.en: A greenhouse, especially one which plants are arranged aesthetically for display at a botanical garden.
sentences.cn: 一种温室, 尤指(植物园中)将植物摆放得很美观以供观赏的暖房.

sentences.en: A professional channel that promotes excellent traditional Chinese opera arts and is aesthetically satisfying.
sentences.cn: 以弘扬和发展中国各地优秀戏曲艺术,满足戏迷审美要求为宗旨的专业频道.

sentences.en: A remote should look modern and aesthetically pleasing.
sentences.cn: 看起来要现代和具有美感.

sentences.en: Aesthetically pleasing , harmonious, and effective arrangement of parts to form a whole.
sentences.cn: 各部分和谐生动 、 合美学规律的作品.

sentences.en: All isolation techniques may be aesthetically unacceptable or even dirty.
sentences.cn: 所有的隔离方法都有可能在美观方面使人难以接受,或甚至是肮脏的.

sentences.en: Commit to produce creative products that are aesthetically pleasing yet encompass all of the clients requirements.
sentences.cn: 锐意生产具创意而美观的产品,但同时产品也照颅了客户的所有需求.

sentences.en: Core idea of Eco - house: comfortable, healthy, high - efficiency and aesthetically pleasing.
sentences.cn: 生态住宅的核心思想是: 舒适 、 健康 、 高效和美观.

sentences.en: His body maybe aesthetically appealing, but it is useless.
sentences.cn: 他空有一副臭皮囊, 中看不中用.

sentences.en: It aims to identify the characteristic value of aesthetically satisfying objects.
sentences.cn: 它的目的在于鉴别审美快感的物体所特有的价值.

sentences.en: Master the use of multiple JPanel, combined with multi - layout manager interface design more aesthetically pleasing.
sentences.cn: 掌握使用多个JPanel, 并配合多个布局管理器设计较美观的界面.

sentences.en: Segmental construction contributes toward aesthetically pleasing structures in many different sites.
sentences.cn: 对于许多不同的现场条件,分段施工都能提供美观,颇有魄力的桥型结构.

sentences.en: This building is aesthetically very pleasing.
sentences.cn: 从美学角度来说,这一建筑看上去非常令人满意.

sentences.en: This criticism, aesthetically, is based upon Kantian aesthetics and positivist aesthetics.
sentences.cn: 这种批评论的主要美学基础, 是康德美学与实证主义美学.

sentences.en: This sleek and aesthetically pleasing compact design covers all your beauty needs.
sentences.cn: 这种光滑、美观简洁的设计涵盖了您所有的审美需要.

sentences.en: We have to go beyond understanding art as just something that's aesthetically pleasing or not.
sentences.cn: 我们必须超越仅仅理解的东西的美观与否的艺术.艺术是漂亮得多.

words.tran_cn: 美的；美学的；审美的，具有审美趣味的
审美的；美学的；有审美感的
